Discover

What is the climate footprint?

Since the last century, the concentration of carbon in the atmosphere has increased to such an extent that the planet's climate is undergoing upheaval with far-reaching consequences: rising sea levels, destruction of living organisms, and an explosion of climatic disasters.

The scientific consensus is clear: this increase is directly linked to human activities: the extraction, consumption and combustion of resources exceed our planet's capacity to absorb them. It's high time we reduced or replaced these greenhouse gas-emitting activities, on every scale!

The individual carbon footprint simulator helps you to understand which of our uses contribute most to climate change, and to understand which actions would have the greatest impact in reducing it.

Read more

Open, documented and contributory

Make your contribution to the reference simulator

The source code is open, the site is regularly improved.

The entire calculation is documented online for the curious and the experts.

Any ideas? A correction? A comment? All contributions are welcome!

Discover

What is the climate footprint?

Since the last century, the concentration of carbon in the atmosphere has increased to such an extent that the planet's climate is undergoing upheaval with far-reaching consequences: rising sea levels, destruction of living organisms, and an explosion of climatic disasters.

The scientific consensus is clear: this increase is directly linked to human activities: the extraction, consumption and combustion of resources exceed our planet's capacity to absorb them. It's high time we reduced or replaced these greenhouse gas-emitting activities, on every scale!

The individual carbon footprint simulator helps you to understand which of our uses contribute most to climate change, and to understand which actions would have the greatest impact in reducing it.

Read more

Open, documented and contributory

Make your contribution to the reference simulator

The source code is open, the site is regularly improved.

The entire calculation is documented online for the curious and the experts.

Any ideas? A correction? A comment? All contributions are welcome!

Comment agir ?

Découvrez nos pistes personnalisées pour agir dès aujourd’hui pour le climat.

Toutes les actions

Pour les organisations

Nos Gestes Climat dans votre entreprise, association, école...

Vous souhaitez diffuser Nos Gestes Climat auprès de votre organisation, découvrez-nous outils pour vous simplifier la vie !

Découvrir

L'empreinte climat, qu'est-ce que c'est ?

Depuis le siècle dernier, la concentration du carbone dans l’atmosphère augmente tant et si bien que le climat de la planète subit des bouleversements aux lourdes conséquences : montée des eaux, destruction du vivant, explosion des catastrophes climatiques.

Le consensus scientifique est formel, cette augmentation est directement liée aux activités humaines : l’extraction, la consommation et la combustion de ressources dépassent les capacités d’absorption de notre planète. Il est grand temps de réduire ou remplacer ces activités émettrices de gaz à effet de serre, à toutes les échelles !

Le simulateur d’empreinte carbone individuelle permet de comprendre quels sont nos usages qui contribuent le plus au changement climatique, et de saisir les actions qui auraient le plus d’impact pour le réduire.

En savoir plus

Ouvert, documenté et contributif

Apportez votre pierre au simulateur de référence

Le code source est ouvert, le site est amélioré régulièrement.

L'intégralité du calcul est documenté en ligne pour les curieux et les experts.

Une idée ? Une correction ? Une remarque ? Toute contribution est la bienvenue !

info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
